website_summaries.verdict: This system can cover a large area and has an option to change radio frequencies if you encounter interference.
pros: Provides 1,000 feet of wire and splicers needed to connect it
Easy to set up and easy to use
Works well to contain your dogs even in large areas
Waterproof collars can even be submersed
cons: Some of the connections on this set can be tricky to get right

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted it to work.
customer_reviews.text: I received my kit with a damaged surge protector. It took them over a month to get me a working one. The first replacement was damaged also. After a couple of weeks, my dog started "running" the boundary. I complained and they sent me a "more powerful collar." I figured I was getting their best stuff when I paid extra for the Professionals Grade (Premium) Kit. FYI, there are no instructions. You need to research how to work it yourself. I found some youtubes that taught me how to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: loveistheanswer

customer_reviews.title: Collar and Fence
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this company. When the collar stopped working after a few months they sent out a new one immediately. They are available by phone and very helpful. The system works perfectly and my new collar does as well. I recommend it to anyone that wants a consistent problem free fence.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: The correction has no influence on my dog. I have tried It on my arm to make sure it works. On the low training setting 1. You can’t even feel it’s on. My installation was not a simple one as I have and acre and a half of woods. I have turned it up full blast and he is completely un phases by it. I have tried adjusting the collar and the contact tips etc etc as the manual says. He is a short haired dog as well so contact should not be an issue. Waste of money and labor installing it. I wish I had put the money towards are real fence.
customer_reviews.author: Christian F.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant to make this purchase but I'm glad I did. Have a German Shepherd and a Labradoodle that are inside pets. They would always run off when I'd let them outside. The install was fairly easy to do and took couple hours to do by myself. It works really well for my needs. I purchased the kit with 1500 feet of 14 gauge wire and 2 collars. Called customer service and spoke with Crystal about getting the surge protector, she was very friendly and knowledgeable about the invisible fence. Great customer service and a great product. Would definitely recommend this product to anyone that wants to protect their pets.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: This system works
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great, I have a 2 year old Aussie/ border collie mix. He suffered from separation anxiety terribly. He did a lot of damage to the house and garage, in my effort to contain him while I was at work. Once I put in the system I started at a low level of correction, unfortunately for him His issue required more correction, eventually He found a level he was not willing to accept, That process allowed him to realize, even though I was leaving, I was coming back. He now is very comfortable staying at home when I’m gone and waits confidently till my return, thanks to that system!
customer_reviews.author: R.E.D.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible installation instructions
customer_reviews.text: System might work well but absolutely horrible directions for how to install the fence and splice wires.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Worth the time and money. Responsive company.
customer_reviews.text: We have about 2 acres that we wrapped. I purchased the thicker gage wire because we weren't going to bury due to our rocky soil. We had a faulty base unit that the company replaced overnight. That was awesome. It has been rock solid ever since. The only thing we've done so far was replace the collar, which was just a visual preference. We just got another dog, and will purchase another unit for him soon.
customer_reviews.author: The Casey Family

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: It has been effective for our large dog after proper training. I recommend using the thicker gauge wire, which is what I did. My biggest frustration has been with the twisted wires. They have not provided a resistance free zone for my dog to cross. I am pretty sure I did everything as directed. But my dog still gets a beep and zap when crossing the twisted wire... I had to create my own outdoor utility box set up for the transmitter to be kept outdoors, which required a trip to the hardware store and a little ingenuity to secure the transmitter and wires while maintaining a waterproof environment after bolting to my house
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent DIY Choice!
customer_reviews.text: Looked at having a dog fence company come out...but with starting prices of $1000, we decided to look at DIY options. The reviews for Extreme Dog Fence were very promising, so we ordered. Everything came exactly as described, and the online and included installation instructions were quite detailed and accurate. We installed the fence, plugged it all in...and IT WORKED! The online training videos were a great help and our dog ( Norwegian Elkhound) has adapted to it. He snuck through a couple time, but with some adjustments, he never even tries now. Very pleased, and have needed warranty support once, which was incredibly responsive and easy (thanks, Pam and Kelly)! Very happy customer and a great company!
customer_reviews.author: Leah K Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Works well and very effective!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for over a year and it worked well. I’ve recently experienced some issues with the collar itself and I went online for support. Extreme Dog Fence has a live chat and Melissa was great to work with. Very customer-oriented and she is getting me squared away with my collar issue. I’m very glad they fully stand behind their product and are a customer-oriented business. Professional staff and great company that made an easy to install dog fence for my half acre property! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby M

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever...so glad avoided Box Store Brand!
customer_reviews.text: Love the durability and reliability of this extreme product! We loved we have little under ak care. We loved that we could intall over the ground for now and install in warmer months under ground. We have four dogs over 65lbs. All have learned quickly. I even accident wound the cord in my weed eater; no damage to wire! While I was hesitant to I vest extra for the thicker gauge, so glad we did! NO REGRETS! Only downside was actual nylon collars...didnt hold tight enough, but purchased extreme platic and great! Fur babies are safely running free and happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fence but collar batteries are awful
customer_reviews.text: Good fence. I have it on about 2.5 acres and my dogs like it. If you have a fast dog they can blow past the fence without getting shocked. Ask me how I know. A dog with herding instincts or high prey drive require more training. The multiple shock settings are great especially for different dogs. The only real down side is the cost of batteries for the collars. It would be nice if they were rechargeable or lasted longer than a few weeks even with no use
customer_reviews.author: Tundra

customer_reviews.title: Great fence
customer_reviews.text: We installed the fencing about a month ago & our dogs haven't gone past their boundary markers since training. It has been a life changer! My only complaint would be that I wish the collars were easier to adjust & a better quality. They work fine but I prefer the nicer, wider nylon collars. Would definitely recommend to anyone! We almost spent $3500 for Invisible Fence to install their fence in our one acre yard & glad we saved the $. It took us about 8 total hours with just a shovel & our hands to install the perimeter of our acre over 2 days (got many squats in!). Other than the initial instillation, it is low maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent system. Company needs to include more yard staples.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! Easy to install. We live in the country and chose to keep our wire above the ground. We ran a 900’ perimeter around our house. Very easy and very happy. Had it installed within 1 hour. Only problem we had is that they recommend a yard staple every 5 feet but they only sent 10 staples. I knew this ahead of time and ordered an additional 200 staples from a 3rd party seller. We ended up needing a little more staples. About 300 staples total for 900’ of wire. So that was kind of a pain but still very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Zachery Courter

customer_reviews.title: Good product with exceptions
customer_reviews.text: This product is great until my dog spots a cat or raccoon. After that it is pretty much useless. Blows right through it. Maybe my training wasn’t the best. Who knows. But both my dogs stay inside the boundary when I’m outside with them. Not going to try it without me there. Actually the dachshund was so scared at first he wouldn’t leave the back porch. And I only had it set on tone. But I worked with him and will now venture out a bit. So if you don’t have a crazy dog that likes to chase squirrels and such it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was outstanding. We had a few questions on how to set the collars. The representative was very informative and helpful. We set our fence up in one day. It is used to keep our goats off our porch so set the fence up around the house and patio. (They chose our porch instead of the 50 acres available to them). Some of the wire is above ground and some underground. It only took one time for the goats to get the message. We ordered the 14 gauge for durability. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Buzzard Roost

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We did ourselves and it was so worth it! We have many neighbors with electric fences and they all told me about how much it cost to professionally put it in. Crazy! I could not be happier that we decided to do it ourselves and that we went with Extreme Dog Fence. Everything we needed was included. The directions for the transponder were a little unclear but after a helpful phone call to the company..all has been perfect! Our dog who used to roam the neighborhood and visit every dog she could now stays in her yard. This is a picture of her waiting patiently in the yard for my daughter to walk back from the school bus.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sadik

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: With two new pups, we needed a fence that we could trust. The fence was easily installed and the pups were trained within days. We were relieved to know they were safe. A few months had passed and we discovered we have one pup becoming a little more stubborn than the other. We made two phone calls to customer service regarding an adjustment to their collars and making sure the prongs, batteries and frequency were all working correctly. First phone call to Trevor, the other to Crystal. They were both knowledgeable, patient and sincere. Thank you for helping to solve our problem!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy5528

customer_reviews.title: Neighbor complained and problem solved
customer_reviews.text: My grumpy neighbor threatened to call animal control when my son let our puppy out when I was 39 weeks pregnant and it took me a minute to get outside to get him. He jumped the fence and started barking at my neighbor. “He comes over and barks at me all the time” my neighbor whined. My dog was just at the edge of my driveway. Bought this “puppy” and my husband ran it the next day. Works like a charm! Now my dog barks at him from inside the perimeter :)
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Awesome company
customer_reviews.text: I have had this fence for 2yrs, My fence went down and I went to the extreme fence website to get an new electric board as everything else works, I did the live chat they asked for my amazon order number it came up in there system and as of tomorrow they are shipping me out a new one. So happy with this company. I have 6 dogs and they range from 23lbs to 120 lbs and this fence works for all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was extremely helpful with installation and collar set up, the instruction book was not so much. We have two dogs on the system. One an extra large mastiff who was 18 months at installation and a boxer mix who is about 7. Our mastiff learned quickly and we have had no issues. He hears the warning beep and turns right around. The other is still learning after 3 months. He is high energy and quick to run through the fence when excited. We have 2+ acres with the invisible fence. It was self installed with an edger. I would high recommend renting a wire installer if you have any size yard.
customer_reviews.author: S. Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this system- it's the best
customer_reviews.text: The component quality of this system far surpasses that of the previous two systems I have used. Wire quality and electronic component quality are top notch. Easy to install, and truly outstanding instruction/troubleshooting/dog training guide. Committed and sincere customer service staff answer on the first ring and know what they are talking about. An impressive system and impressive company backing it up. Glad I paid a bit more and got this level of quality.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Impeccable, Sound over shock
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible system that supports my small dogs. Its was easy to install and the staff is GREAT to work with. I would recommend this to anyone that is NOT interested in trying to stretch chain link fence and the constant worry of them digging out. The sound system is very nice, so if you are worried about a shock to your dogs, and they train fairly easy, you will never have have to shock them.
customer_reviews.author: Doolie

customer_reviews.title: New customer to the underground dog fence
customer_reviews.text: It took about 2 hours to lay out in my yard I have almost 1 acre of yard. I put the collars on the dogs and walked them around the yard. It only took 2 nights of working with them and now they don't leave the yard. I keep checking to see if they want to leave by walking outside the line, the dogs come up to the area and stop and go back to the house. Works awesome wish I would have purchased this awhile ago. I have 3 english golden retrievers.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Keep your pup at home and safe!
customer_reviews.text: My Dane suddenly took up fence climbing/jumping which we could not get her to give up! We purchased this fencing which was easy to install and that was the end of my dogs escapades. She now stays a safe distance from the fence! Love it! Called the company today to purchase extra batteries. Christine was very helpful and my batteries are on the way. Zi definitely recommend this company and product.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Good system, durable, reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality wire, installed on 4 acres in one day using a telephone wire trencher, and a concrete saw for the driveway. Transmitter was easy. Collars are ok. Just purchased two more new ones after two years of hard use. Had one die the first year. The batteries are less than good. Replaced numerous times. Have called customer service a time or two for various things, they are good. Good system, I would recommend. I’m hopeful the two collars I just ordered work with the transmitter, that was an issue last year. Bad collar, but customer service took care of me.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for our dog
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for our dog. We rent our house & got a puppy, unfortunately we don’t have a fence, so we looked for an alternative & found this. We followed the instruction for training our puppy, bumped it up as needed, & it’s great! He definitely know where his limits are, & stops short even when chasing squirrels from the bird feeders! 🤣 We outlined our whole back yard which backs into a woods with a public path. When we move we’re gonna bring it with us!
customer_reviews.author: KNorthcott

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality Product and Good Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: The fence was very easy to set up and the training advice that came with it worked like a charm - even for my stubborn pup! After a few months, the volume on the collar was nearly silent, but I called customer service and left a message. They called me back the next day and are in the process of mailing me a new collar. I am very satisfied with the fence and as long as this replacement collar fixes the volume issue, I will be pleased with it as well. The customer service agent was very friendly and I would be glad to refer them to my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: lilcole

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a big review writer but I had to for this. This was a long process of setting up, we had to order extra wire and cross our driveway......BUT sooo worth it. Our dog was running off every single time he went outside ( the way our yard is, we can’t have a fence) This thing has been a dream since it’s been done. He was mad at us at first but now he stays in our yard! You need this!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Bonds

customer_reviews.title: SUPER-pleased
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first, but now, it's the best purchase since moving into our new house. Beau is loved by everyone in the neighborhood, because he's able to hang out in the yard and socialize. People are AMAZED at how well he has responded to it. NEVER breaks thru...not for kids, other dogs, nothing. Installation was easy. Training was a breeze. Some breeds may be a tougher learn...goldens are known to be exceptionally smart and easily trained. But at the end of the day, we have peace of mind letting Beau outside anytime and knowing he's safe and having fun. Highly recommend. And the support staff, Pam, Crystal and others have all been great!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Saunders

customer_reviews.title: It feels like quality
customer_reviews.text: Get the pro kit with the 14 gauge wire, it's worth the extra money. We put ours down over about an acre with three dog collars and it works great. The directions are good with a very detailed manual, and once you run your wire ( this is hardest part) the hook ups are really easy. I called customer service to register mine and they were very friendly and knowledgeable. Do this yourself and save over $1000 compared to these install companies.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty fence system. The install was simple and I am using it for 2 dogs a very active border collie and our yellow lab the “follower”. This system is going to lead to peaceful days of knowing our dogs are safe. I love that you can reach real people when contacting this company. The help desk is awesome sauce!
customer_reviews.author: Jnor

customer_reviews.title: Great fence - outstanding cust service
customer_reviews.text: Fence works great. Perimeter is approximately 1acre. Field varies very little as is a problem w many of these systems. I've had it for 2yrs. Collar malfunctioned, the battery would drain in a day. Customer service was outstanding. They sent out a replacement immediately with no issues. Outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: TBB

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my dogs protected staying in our yard!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fence in August of 2018 for my two German Shepherds. Couldn't be more satisfied. Customer service is top notch. I recommend this fence to anyone looking for a excellent in ground fence. One of my Shepherds is young and hard headed so far has worked for us, my other Shepherd won't go within 10 feet of the flags and the flags are set up at least 5 feet from where we buried the line. So glad I choose this set up, I also purchased additional wire and additional flags.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: ... to keep our two dogs from digging "Great Escape" like tunnels under our 5 foot high chain link fence
customer_reviews.text: We got this product to keep our two dogs from digging "Great Escape" like tunnels under our 5 foot high chain link fence. They think they are Charles Bronson. We zip tied it to the fence approx. 18 inches off the ground. At each gate we ran it down the posts and underground in pvc pipe to protect it from mowers. The manual was the only negative aspect , it was a little better than some that are obviously written in Chinese and then translated to English. All in all a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Novak

customer_reviews.title: great fence system!
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far! It took our puppy a few days to get it figured out but he knows his boundaries pretty well now. I had to figure out the different levels to get the right one. The strap on the collar is too long with no good way to keep it out of the way. Overall it's a great system and much cheaper than having a company come in and do one!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to install Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Easy to install. I rented a cable installer to lay 4 acres of wire and had the whole system hooked up in two hours! Highly recommend this product! Their customer service has to be the best I’ve ever felt with! Call the number and someone picks up right away! Send an email, they respond right away. Melissa W helped me with an issue I was having and got me up and running in no time! She then followed up to ensure everything was still operating as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Bward

customer_reviews.title: Works great, dogs are safe
customer_reviews.text: My dogs no longer chase the mailman , UPS .and FedEx drivers up the road . They got shocked One time and won't go near the road anymore . I bought a good edger to dig the 1200 feet of groove needed to run the wire in and it took 2 guys About 1 1/2 days from start to finish . A little work but well worth not worrying about my best friends getting run over .
customer_reviews.author: Clifford R. Sapienza

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We use the wire to put on our backyard fence because we had a dog that jumped over it and then also put it in ground around the side in front. Good customer service. It took us a while to install it and then we found out that the hyper receiver that we ordered was not needed for one of our dogs. Even though it Had been over a month they agreed to take it back and send me an active receiver no problem
customer_reviews.author: MFW

customer_reviews.title: Technical Support - Awesome, Thanks, Savannah!
customer_reviews.text: We installed the fence about 6 months ago. This was a do it yourself install. It was super easy to install. After 6 months one of our receivers stopped proving the shock stimulus. Yesterday I called customer support and talked to Savannah. Savannah walked me through the process of reprogramming the receiver. She was awesome and patient and I was able to reprogram received with no issues. Now our Great Dane, Carl, is safe and staying in the yard again. Thank you for providing a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan/Terry

customer_reviews.title: It Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I ran about 950 feet of wire underground to make a large area for my farm dog to run. I was skeptical that the stubborn 6-month old puppy would run right through it. I followed the training book closely. After about 2 weeks or so of training, he was on his own 24/7 with the collar. I think he only got shocked a couple of times during the whole training process. He has been outside for over two months now and has never gotten past it. The product is definitely well-made and seems like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Higgins

customer_reviews.title: works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service! Saved $$! Invisible fence was charging $1500 for installation because I had collars. I ordered this kit for $500. It took a little bit of manual labor to secure the line but totally worth it. We used an edger and the landscaping pins and about 1 1/2 hrs because my kids were "helping". The 1000 ft wire easily covered our acre of land. Didn't recall seeing the splicer kit so I called customer service and they replaced it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: We have a 62 lbs black lab. It worked at first but now our dog runs right thru it.......even at the highest setting. Tried everything from re-training but the fence just does not seem to work like it should. Wasted 400.00 on this piece of junk. Do not spend the extra money on this so-called professional fence. You will be better off buying cheap because they are just as effective. We are buying a long leash line to let her run in the back yard. Should have done that from the beginning. Do not buy this product......over priced & under performed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the answer for containing the most aggressive and persistent dog!
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog that no matter how large the area she would either jump the fence or dig under. Since I fenced in an acre of wooded lot it was impossible to bury the wire due to tree roots so I purchased the heavier gauge wire and put it along the bottom of the fence then continued to just below the top of the fence. I may have spent more for the premium kit but it was much cheaper than being sued for a dog bite. It works perfectly and she learned very quickly on even the smallest setting. I highly recommend this kit for even the most persistent dog!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous for Your Pet
customer_reviews.text: This product caused severe damage to my pet. I'm currently sitting at the vet while he's treated for wounds and infection caused by the collar. He was fine three days ago when he had a bath and today he has a 4x8 inch area of hair missing with pus coming out. This is horrible and I will NEVER buy another product like this. Would never recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: DejaTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Our Goldendoodle thinks everyone is his friend and we could not keep him from chasing bikes, walkers, squirrels etc. The Extreme Dog Fence is wonderful. The training manual was very helpful and we found our dog learned his boundaries very quickly. They start you on a very light correction so it doesn't hurt the dog at all, we never had to make the corrections too high. He responds to the noise wonderfully. We did follow the training manual carefully but it was easy to follow and has just worked perfectly. Battery life is great, we just replaced our first battery after 8 months of daily use! My husband installed the fence himself with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Marta H.

customer_reviews.title: great product, works awesome
customer_reviews.text: The hardest part is making a trench for wire to go underground. I rented an edger from local tool rental facility to create the trench. After that, the install was easy as the instruction was easy to follow. The fence system works extremely well and took my dogs a few hours to learn. I have had it installed for a year now and absolutely have had no issues. I purchased the heavier gauge wire for my fence. I highly recommend this system to anyone, works better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great option.
customer_reviews.text: Product support is excellent which makes the ease of use closer to 5 star. Also this is key so that you configure or lay it out properly. I went with the pro version so that I could leave it above ground. Great value for money. We got a quote for basically the same thing for $2k. Note of caution. It’s not a magic fence. You do need to have the dog wear the collar and do all the training.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: great collars
customer_reviews.text: Normal install works as it should. The only thing I was really worried about was the collars but they have held up great and my dogs don't even seem to notice them. I've had my fence in for about 2 months now and it has been a lifesaver. I can let my dogs out and not worry about them jumping the fence and me having to chase them down.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great fence, and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This fencing system works wonders for my smart, but hard-headed bulldog mix. He is a Houdini, who finds his way out of our 2-acre fenced in yard within minutes. He learned the perimeter in one day. Recently I had issues with the collar itself, and after replacing the battery and trying to troubleshoot myself, I called the 800 number and spoke to Rebecca, who was amazing and is sending me a new collar. I definitely recommend this fencing system!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Z.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have a one year old Husky who would go on adventures outside of our yard during the night when we were sleeping. We decided to buy the premium kit as we have 10 acres to fence. We attached the wire to our existing fence posts most of the way around our property. To fence the entire 10 acres required just under 3000' of wire plus 300' of twisted wire to return to our house. It took me less than 3 days to install everything and have it up and running. So far everything is working great!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Services.
customer_reviews.text: System works great! Installed in about a day on 1.5 acres. Once you get used to the sensitivity of the program buttons, the system is very easy to work with. This system will let you program collars at different correction levels for different dogs. Any time I have had any question about the unit, someone like Crystal has always been there to assist me. I have always hung up with the Extreme customer service people and been very pleased with there ability and determination that I was satisfied with there help. They definitely believe that the customer is always right. Thank you again Crystal!!
customer_reviews.author: Timmy J.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this fence...
customer_reviews.text: We installed this system a month ago and so far we're pleased with it. Installation was pretty smooth with some planning and we like that you can program each dog's collar to best suit them. The customer service is great! They might call you first just to let you know they're always available to help with any question! I would just suggest not rushing the training part, it takes a little patience with some dogs, but it's worth the time. I would recommend Extreme Dog fences to anyone needing an underground containment system
customer_reviews.author: Ms Straw

customer_reviews.title: In use for 2 months- great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a contractor so this was a very easy install for him. There was some electrical work that he had to do to set up the box and run the connector wires out from house. We rented a machine that buried cable to run the wire through our yard. We’ve been using it 2 months so far and not a single problem. I have highly recommended this product to friends and neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great service!! Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with my 2 dog fence. It was not the products fault, it was mine and they took great care of me. My 2 boxers love going to to the elementary just down the street as they love kids.. Oddly the school doesn't appreciate the visits, especially when my younger dog roamed into the school. This has absolutely helped solve these situations.. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: LB007

customer_reviews.title: great product, saved 2k via DIY.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Used an edge to install but would have been easier with one of the trenchers that automatically buries the wire. Turns out we have a pretty stubborn dog (Bernie-doodle) who likes to socialize with the dogs in the hood despite getting shocked. Melissa was super helpful in guiding me through some troubleshooting and helped set me up with a resistant/stubborn collar which is helping!
customer_reviews.author: TimothyStidham

customer_reviews.title: Great company to work with
customer_reviews.text: Great support. Depending on your layout it is easy to set up. We were able to use an existing cut in driveway, when we crossed it. We had an issue, called tech support and they helped us correct the settings. If you buy from their website you can get a free surge protector. Update to my prior review. I continue to get great support, they called out to me today to see how everything was going. I spoke with Crystal and she helped me with a couple of things on my system. One of the best companies to work with and their support is excellent. Thank you Crystal.
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: Best money ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: This fence is keeping my very diggy dogs inside our fence and out of the neighborhood. Their support is fantastic and were very helpful when I have called. I had a problem with my hardware and they went above and beyond to take care of me. I definitely recommend this fence to anyone that needs to keep their dogs in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy John Gray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Not only a great product but awesome customer service. I was having trouble setting up the frequency on the receiver. I called the customer service team and they walked me through everything step by step with such patience! Recently I had to call back and I spoke with crystal. She was wondering patiently helping me trouble shot. We determined it was a battery issue and she made sure that I know how to reorder the correct battery for the future. She was a great help and asset to the company!
customer_reviews.author: Erica W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The fence was easy to install with the right equipment (I used a straight blade edger Attachment for my gas power weed eater). Took about 8 hours to do 1-1/2 acres and came with enough flags as well. Had a issue with the prongs on the collar and customer service was great in resolving the issue. I would buy again and will recommend to other dog owners.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Its everything it says it is. That should be enough. My husband even had to add more wire because we have a large yard and it hooked up with no problem. One of our dogs is having a hard time with it, but it has nothing to do with the fence. It is working exactly the way it is supposed to. Our other dog only needed a couple beeps to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna R.

customer_reviews.title: Great option, but if you need the surface grade wire, this is not it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one and returned it. When searching Amazon using the "above ground wire", this shows up. I wanted the thicker cable in order to lay it above ground. Still the new one I received was easy to install, you just need to plan ahead the layout and invest time laying it out and testing it before securing it. I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: G-Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Solid to Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Works Awesome. We have three dogs on our 1 acre property and finally they are all contained! The instructions for the product are very easy to follow. The product itself is feels like good quality. Despite the labor of being on my hands and knees, the product was easy to install. I suggest you plan out the layout before getting started, so that you can easily create the loop. It worked for us but I could see that as an area where people get confused and make mistakes. Other than that, really easy to install and good quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Sucks, Batteries Suck, Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I should have done my research on your product better before spending the amount of money that I did and to find out that the warranty that I also purchased, doesn't include accidental damage, even given the nature of the product, that's crazy. And that the batteries barely last 6 months, and having to spend $80 a year on batteries, again, crazy. Then the prices of a replacement collar? And that certain collars are only compatible with certain systems? There are more respectable brands on the market, I don't need this money pit. Do not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Works as described. Terrified my dog. Discontinued use
customer_reviews.text: This product works as described. Unfortunately attempting to train my dog as per instructions on this product I did not like the effect it was having on her. I turned it off and will no longer use it. This product was a mistaken purchase for me. I wish I had not bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Young

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I want to quality and ground fence we had purchased $99 before that did not work well cheaply made this one is definitely heavy duty straightforward installation and our dog abides like a dream we have 1000 foot in the ground and it works great so far
customer_reviews.author: matthew williams

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Dog Fence
customer_reviews.text: The 14ga wire is perfect for mixed terrain and Midwestern changing seasons. Easy to install, high quality, and strong shocking options. More than enough to instill a healthy fear into my two 60# pits. One of the collar’s probes broke shortly after I installed the system, and Crystal was super helpful and sent me a new collar with no questions asked! Would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: carrie l.taylor

customer_reviews.title: WELL worth the price and install! Great customer service!  Safe pets have NO price!
customer_reviews.text: Was relatively easy to self-install. Dogs picked up on the consept right away! Product supplies were 100% accurate and durable. A GREAT product! We called the 1-800 number for help w programming and got a human being right away! And on a Sunday! (How nice, right?) Very helpful and patient! Thank You! Now our dogs are safe and that is worth a million bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, time to start training!
customer_reviews.text: The installation was pretty quick, the only issue we ran into was the fault of our wet ground, nothing at all to do with the product. We just got it set up and flagged. Now it's time to start training our two big babies. Will try to post an update once we've had a chance to try it out for real.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M.

customer_reviews.title: Only 10 stakes
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great quality product but they only give you 10 above ground staples/stakes. The instructions say “use our provided stakes to hold wire down above ground”. I ordered 1000 foot of wire. Tell me how it’s possible to tie that wire down correctly, with only 10 stakes. Overall quality is there, they just cheap out on the extra parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont work for all breed of dog
customer_reviews.text: If you have a larger breed dog, this fence don't work. I have a great dane and he's to high above the fence to get shocked.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this works for a smaller dog. I have a large dog and at first it worked, but after a few months he figured out that if he runs fast the shock doesn't bother him. Disappointing considering how expensive it is.
customer_reviews.author: KJT

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Small cavie stays put! love that we could make our own perimeter as our yard is uneven . collar is light and easy for our 15lb dog 🐶. They even checked in by email to see how we were doing with our new electric fence .
customer_reviews.author: Albatross

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is junk. If the dog has hip problems and walks extremely slow it may work. If the dog walks normal pace half the time it will not even go off and beep. Extreme waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, until dog wants squirrel
customer_reviews.text: We bought the xtreme pro, and it definitely shocks my Doberman, but does not contain him if he sees something he wants, like a squirrel. At least once a week he charges through the fence. The shock, if he even feels it at his full running speed, doesn’t phase him.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Weems

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Strung 1500 feet of wire and was a little nirvous that I may have done a lot of work for nothing. Had a little trouble at first getting my 120 lb. Wolamute, with a thick undercoat, to feel the shock, but after working with the very helpful staff on the call-in line I was able to get it to work perfectly. Training took all of 10 minutes and she doesn't want anything to do with the boundry. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: James H. Tenzel, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: High quality and reliable results.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on top of the soil and covered with a mix of dirt and gravel. Working well but I suggest burying the cable on sloped areas. The rain washes off the covering of dirt. High quality fencer.
customer_reviews.author: ð  ð  ­

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really need a custom battery
customer_reviews.text: Just a tip for everyone struggling with the "special" 6V battery. It's just 2 3Vs wrapped in plastic. You can just buy 3V DL1/3N batteries and use 2 of them stacked together. Plastic wrap not required 👍
customer_reviews.author: Bitt

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dogs in the yard
customer_reviews.text: I have two labs and this fence was a must. they were leaving the yard, playing on road, or chasing the neighbors horses. I didn't want an actual fence, b/c I love the openness of country living. I was very impressed with the 14 gauge wire, and how strong it was. Installation took me a while. 2 acres, with an edger took a long time. If i had to do it again, i would rent a trencher from the local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: h0m3$kill3t

customer_reviews.title: What a relief!
customer_reviews.text: I was very anxious about installing this and then not being able to train my dog to it. But the installation was easy--they have great customer service and online tutorials that really helped. I followed the instructions to the letter about training the dog and he learned very quickly! (He IS kinda smart!) But could not be more pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful
customer_reviews.text: I installed this product . Followed all the direction to a "T" . Trained my dog to the letter. Shocker on the coller just not powerful enough . Very unhappy with product after hearing such great reviews . would probably work for a small back yard and a small dog. My dog is a 6 month Chocolate Lab. Just not enough for him at all. He thinks the shock is a scratch and doesnt phase him at all hardly Im asking for a full refund. Again this would be good for a small yard and dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping-good product-great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product. It worked perfectly. It just wasn’t strong enough for my property size of 20 acres, so we cut our containment area down to about 4 acres and it worked like a dream. However, we needed our dogs to access our whole property, so I spoke with the company and they exchanged the product for one that would work better for us. The people I spoke with were very helpful and understanding. They were polite and courteous and made sure that I had everything I needed. I will buy from them again and highly recommend this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica N

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Best dog training device we’ve ever bought. Our German Shepherd/Husky mix was a wanderer when we adopted him. He was always running off on us. After several shock collars, we decide to spend the extra money on this dog fence. Well worth the money. We no longer really need to use the collar anymore, because he knows where the boundaries are on our full 4 acres. This fence completely solved his running off problem. Highly recommend Extreme Dog Fence!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Massey

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, decent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a comparable product to petsafe at about 1/3rd of the cost. Wire is thick and strong, the splicing kits are very easy to use. Instructions are detailed and videos are on the website. My kit came missing a minor part and they shipped it to me right away. Programming takes some time but call their hotline if you have issues. Have been using for a couple weeks and so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was extremely satisfied with the quality of the components and the service ...
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely satisfied with the quality of the components and the service from the company. I had just received the fence when I managed to twist off one of the posts from the collar. I thought I was out the collar. I contacted the company and not only were they really nice but they sent a new collar to me. Now here is company that cares about their customers. The instructions that came with the fence were easy to follow and our dog really took to the training suggested in the instructions. I like that a surge protector was included as well. Overall I have been extremely pleased with the investment in this fence.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my active Great Pyrenees on my 3 acre property. I was very sceptical that it even would work with her, I thought she would run right threw it. But low and behold within 3 days of training she stayed in the yard! ( she was a runner btw!) she knows exactly how far to the line she can go. Amazing product! Wish we did it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: This fence is perfect and just what i was looking for and wanted for our 100+lbs GSD. now he has 5 acres to run and i don’t have to worry about him.
customer_reviews.author: J&M

customer_reviews.title: If unsure don’t headate to call teck support
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this the fence a few months ago. I have to say we procrastinated Was concerned another the safety of our fur babies My husband did the install with some help from teck support 🍁 they have been very helpful with the layout and learing the program 👏👏👏👏
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived right on time and exactly as ordered. I have a big, fenced in backyard but some of the areas have fences that are easy to jump. It took about 4 hours to install it all along the fence line (about a 1/3 of an acre). After about 5 days of training our very active/agile boxer no longer goes anywhere near the fence line! She's happy AND safe and we are very glad we purchased this product!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMER SERVICE TO THE MAX!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product last year, installed it myself with ease and everything worked as needed. I used a Pro Grade edger to dig the lawn for the electrical line. Directions were easy to follow. Had a couple small issues but customer service located in Florida assisted me with no hold times on the phone. Awesome USA company with incredible customer service. Product looks to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Nice system!
customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions for install and it worked great right out of the box. Training guide was helpful, dogs took to it very quickly. After three days of training they were set free, amazing how fast they learn where the line is. They absolutely don’t want to cross!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just completed installation of the fence system. Tested out with no issues. Had trouble with power surge protector attachment clips. The springs on 2 of 4 clips that hold the cable in the surge protector fell out of the holder. Called Customer Care Center number and a replacement unit was shipped. Very responsive to customer needs. Fence system appears to work well. Will know better after additional time with the fence in service.
customer_reviews.author: First time customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I can tell you this is one of the best products. I would have never thought it would work on my 2 stubborn 80 lbs dogs. It has been almost a year now, customer service is e excellent, I would like to give props to melissa w, even when the phone disconnected she called me back and took care everything. If you are thinking whether to order this product, u can stop shopping and reading reviews just I like I did for days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Underground Fence
customer_reviews.text: The extreme dog fence has been worth every penny. Installation took longer for us but only because we had so much rain and it was tough burying 2000ft in basically mud. We have a 1 1/2 yr old Akita and she trained to the fence in two days. I sometimes don’t put the collar on her now and she doesn’t know it. She stays right in the yard. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This system WORKS for BIG DOGS
customer_reviews.text: Love that I don't need fences on the property to keep my 90 lb Alaskan Malmute home. I rented a trench digger to bury the wire, that's the only part that I disliked. Excellent product. It Works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Camille2322

customer_reviews.title: This Works Wonders
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but oh-so worth it. We were frustrated with our dogs taking off. We fenced over an acre of our yard so they could run around and this has been amazing. Took very little time for our 2 dogs to learn their boundaries.
customer_reviews.author: MNutt

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product 2 months ago. Waited a bit to provide a review to see how it works. Amazing product. We have 2 labs to a maniacs and escape artists. Got the perimiter fence up around our one acre yard. Collars set and not one issue w dogs getting out. They learned quickly and set up was easy. Spoke w nicole in customer service on battery replacements and she sent us 2 out right away. Positive interactions w her. Definitely recommend this product. Great customer service and experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Installed 1700 feet of wire. 2000 foot spool was heavy. I rigged a hand truck to hold the spool making laying the wire much easier. Clear instructions. Easy setup and connections. Works well even with the long wire run. I contacted the company (located in Florida) for a question. The call was answered directly by a live person! My inquiry was resolved quickly and above my expectations. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: 3 very large dogs stay in the yard now. Followed the directions, and was able to train all three dogs. I would highly recommend! We needed to use customer service too and they were fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M. Thelen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your time and money...
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Dog consistently ran right through the shocks.... DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: R.

product_meta.title: Extreme Dog Fence - Second Generation -2020- Professional Grade (Premium) Kit Packages
feature_bullets: 🏆 Improved: This 2nd Generation eXtreme Dog Fence PRO GRADE KIT Easily Covers up to 10 Acres and has Updated Electronics with 3 Antennas, 12x Battery Check, Temp Check and Wire Check

🏆 Waterproof and Submersible: Most Other Inground Dog Fence Systems Claim to be "Water Resistant". The eXtreme Dog Fence Includes a Collar Receiver that is COMPLETELY Waterproof, and Can be Submerged to 10' Deep. Your Dog Can Swim with the Collar on and Won't Affect it's Functionality
🏆 Pro Grade Fence Kit Includes: 14 Gauge Heavy Duty Boundary Wire, 16 Gauge Twisted Wire, Digital Transmitter, Collar Receiver(s) w/ Battery, Training Flags, Splice Kits, and 10 Staples

🏆 Guarantee: This Underground Dog Fence Includes a 1 Year Warranty. When You Register Your Fence, Your Warranty eXtends to 10 Years. This Fence WILL Contain Your Dog and has Been Manufactured for More than 25 Years and Carries a Stellar Reputation for Reliability and Performance

🏆 U.S.A. : These Electric Fences for Dogs Are Proudly Manufactured in the Good Old United States of America. We are Standing By to Provide You Top Level Assistance and Support in Setting Up Your Fence, Training Your Dogs and Puppies, or Troubleshooting Any Issue that Comes Up

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
